description.p: PulsimGui is a cross-platform graphical user interface for the Pulsim power electronics simulator. It provides an intuitive schematic editor for designing and simulating power converter circuits.

ul.li: Schematic editor with drag-and-drop component placement
Comprehensive component library (MOSFETs, IGBTs, diodes, etc.)
Real-time waveform viewer with cursors and measurements
Project templates for common converter topologies

description.p: Maintenance release with packaging and runtime consistency improvements.

ul.li: Schematic editor with pan, zoom, and grid
Component library with power electronics devices
